title: 英國的IT狗 揀左科internet law讀 想搵熟UK law既大佬幫下手

replies.msg:
唔該咁多位熟law既大佬可唔可以講下以下情景有冇犯法同埋ref case等我慢慢睇

情景1:
UK-based 社交平台 類似 Facebook 發現一位 security engineer 入左 Facebook user database拎私人資料. 咁Facebook既 security engineers 就冇授權可以入去user database.
Facebook就認為呢堆資料比個員工交左去third party 度 commit identity fraud

情景2:
另一位Facebook員工加入左個hacker組織, 呢位員工用Facebook公司既電腦去 DDoS 白宮同五角大樓.
另外佢亦都用mailbomb attack 打鳩佢前老細Twitter.

情景3:
第三位員工用Facebook server 經營一個 anti-war activist website, 呢個網站包括英國軍事機場list, 入去軍事機場既教學(詳細地圖). 教點樣自製爆炸物同燃燒設備.
個網站叫 ‘Fighting Firepower’

情景4:
第四位員工Dinesh 就同 Monica 拍緊拖, 佢地就有交換裸照既. 某一日條女就想同條仔分手, 個男仔就好撚嬲, 然後就係Facebook post左張條女既裸照仲話條女係Slut

除此之外, 條仔就係咁send message比條女求佢一齊返, 就算條女已經whatsapp同facebook message條仔話永遠都冇可能一齊返. Monica 覺得條仔仲不斷搵佢覺得好撚煩



Advise on any potential criminal offences being committed by Facebook employees or civil claims
arising from their actions, with reference to the relevant laws and case authorities.

情景1:
Friendbook is a UK-based social media platform. Recently Friendbook noticed that one of their employees, Anna, a security engineer, has been accessing the Friendbook user database to obtain personal details of Friendbook users. Security engineers at Friendbook do not have authorisation to access the user database. Friendbook believes that these are being passed onto a third party who may be using these details to commit identity fraud.

情景2:
Another employee, Bob, has recently joined the hacker collective ‘Xposure.’ Bob has secretly been using Friendbook computers to co-ordinate DDoS attacks on the White House and the Pentagon and has carried out a mailbomb attack on his former employer Allsafe Cybersecurity.

情景3:
A third employee, Carla, operates an anti-war activist website from her Friendbook server space.
This website contains a list of UK military airports, advice on how to gain entry to them, including detailed maps, and advice on how to make home-made explosives and incendiary devices. The website is called ‘Fighting Firepower’.

情景4:
A fourth employee, Dinesh, had been in a relationship with Monica. When they were in a
relationship they ‘sexted’ each other, that is exchanged private sexual images of themselves with each other. This morning, Monica messaged Dinesh to end their relationship because she wants to date Dinesh’s best friend, Eric. Dinesh was very upset and reacted by posting a sexual image of Monica on Friendbook, with the status update: ‘Eric & the World: Monica is a Slut!’ Despite this action he has also sent her many messages pleading to get back together even though Monica has said in a text message and a Friendbook message that she’ll never forgive him for posting the photo of her and that she doesn’t want to talk to him because their relationship is over and finds his constant messages upsetting.

Advise on any potential criminal offences being committed by Friendbook employees or civil claims arising from their actions, with reference to the relevant laws and case authorities.
